name: Mars Caves Defense - Bullet Hell Jam
name_original: Mars Caves Defense - Bullet Hell Jam
description:
Mars Caves Defense

Snapshots of the game development

Bullet Hell Jam 2022

200 years of construction of a human friendly ecosystem is menaced by an allien invasion, since the nearest planet has no atmosphere, the mankind has covered channels and adapted mars' caves insufflating air and bringing  earth fauna to make a new habitable world...

Your role is to stop these evil invaders

Hey, now we have a Sound Designer:

pomba terrorista#5406

julliowhyllan@gmail.com

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFGTB861JGCoeTmLCXJepmg

I have only a feel days to finish this game for the Jam, so let's get to work  ;D

Drop me a line if you want to enter in this challenge ...

I am using Defold engine

I need Lua programmers

GUI makers

Audio (already found) OK 

And artists

It's just for fun, no money involved...

Or I'll have to do everything by  myself  : (
